snippet: Journalists and White House officials were evacuated by the Secret Service in the middle of the daily briefing. They were allowed back in a short time later.

byline.contributor: Emmarie Huetteman and Mikayla Bouchard contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Journalists and White House officials were evacuated by the Secret Service in the middle of the daily briefing. They were allowed back in a short time later.

headline.main: White House Press Room Is Briefly Evacuated After Bomb Threat
